choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.
Sure, here is an example of what I think would be a good and balanced menu.  It includes some protein sources like chicken breast or salmon as well as vegetables such as broccoli and sweet potatoes. You can also add in other foods that you enjoy! 
Breakfast - 1 cup oatmeal with blueberries, 2 scrambled eggs, coffee/tea
Lunch- 4 oz grilled chicken breast, salad of spinach leaves, strawberries, walnuts, goat cheese
Snack- apple slices and almonds
Dinner- salmon filet, brown rice, steamed broccoli, orange segments
